summary: When the thugs who killed his father come looking for him, a young Latino man and his mother flee from their home.
cast: Michael Philip Del Rio|Samuel Molina|Rick Sepulveda|Manny Perez|D.C. Benny|Mercedes Mercado|Carmen Gloria Pérez|Zulay Henao|Jessica Pimentel|Angelic Zambrana|Julie Carmen|Ronald Escobar|Gary Perez|Rick Gonzalez|Dania Ramirez|Sherionne Lanier|J. title: Illegal Tender
